text: Alfred Schmidt (born 19 May 1931, Berlin â€“ 28 August 2012, Frankfurt am Main) was a German philosopher. ==Life== Schmidt studied history, English and philology at the Goethe University Frankfurt and later philosophy and sociology. Schmidt was professor of philosophy and sociology at the University of Frankfurt from 1972 and was made emeritus in 1999. Schmidt was a member of the International PEN and an honorary member of the Schopenhauer Society. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2012 deaths Category:20th-century German philosophers Category:21st-century German philosophers Category:Academics of Goethe University Frankfurt Category:People from Berlin
title: Alfred Schmidt
